Content: Renowned Meditation practitioner, Ven Diyasenpura Wimala Thero, the resident monk at ‘Bavunseth Mind Relaxing Meditation Centre’ at Hellummahara, Dekatana conducted one more meditation session for five Officers and fifty eight Other Ranks of the Sri Lanka Army on Wednesday (5). It was organized at the request of the Directorate of Psychological Operations of the Army Headquarters.
